AmmoCategoryDef.label: FMJ
AmmoCategoryDef.description: The soft lead core is encased in a harder metal coating, combining a medium amount of stopping power and armor penetration.

AmmoCategoryDef.label: AP
AmmoCategoryDef.description: Features a hardened steel penetrator core for increased armor penetration.

AmmoCategoryDef.label: HP
AmmoCategoryDef.description: A hollowed out tip causes the bullet to expand on impact, increasing tissue damage at the cost of armor penetration.

AmmoCategoryDef.label: APDS
AmmoCategoryDef.description: Uses a discarding sabot to fire an undersized projectile at higher muzzle velocities, greatly improving armor penetration.

AmmoCategoryDef.label: AP-I
AmmoCategoryDef.description: Filled with an incendiary compound that ignites on impact, doing additional damage and potentially igniting targets.

AmmoCategoryDef.label: AP-HE
AmmoCategoryDef.description: Filled with high-explosives that detonate on impact for additional damage.
